user_query: I'm writing an article about the impact of news sentiment on stock prices. Can you give me the sentiment scores for the latest news articles related to Tesla (TSLA)? Additionally, provide me with the daily stock metrics for the past month.

TaskList.description: Fetch the latest news articles related to Tesla (TSLA).
Analyze the sentiment of the fetched news articles and generate sentiment scores.
Retrieve daily stock metrics for Tesla (TSLA) for the past month.
